form.label: Demo 02 : Supply Chain PO Lifecycle Monitoring
form.description: Monitoring all EDI X12 / SAP iDocs Transactions from ERP / Data Exchange Platforms

search.query: ```index=supply_chain_edi sourcetype="edi:x12" ``` | eval edi_ack_status_combo=edi_code+"-"+edi_code_ack+"-"+edi_ack_status | eval edi_code_groupby=if(isnull(edi_code_ack), edi_code, edi_code_ack) | stats last(_time) as _time, last(edi_requestor) as edi_requestor, last(edi_responder) as edi_responder, first(edi_code) as edi_type, values(edi_code) as edi_code, last(edi_ack_status) as edi_ack_status by edi_tr_id edi_code_groupby | eval edi_ack_success=if(isnull(edi_ack_status), "No_Respond" , "Respond") | timechart count by edi_ack_success | eval edi_ack_request_total=No_Respond+Respond | table _time, edi_ack_request_total

```index=supply_chain_edi sourcetype="edi:x12" ``` | table _time edi_ack_status edi_buyer edi_code edi_code_ack edi_cont_num edi_date edi_flag edi_requestor edi_responder edi_seller edi_sequence edi_time edi_tr_id edi_type | eval edi_ack_status_combo=edi_code+"-"+edi_code_ack+"-"+edi_ack_status | eval edi_code_groupby=if(isnull(edi_code_ack), edi_code, edi_code_ack) | stats last(_time) as _time, last(edi_requestor) as edi_requestor, last(edi_responder) as edi_responder, first(edi_code) as edi_type, values(edi_code) as edi_code, last(edi_ack_status) as edi_ack_status by edi_tr_id edi_code_groupby | eval edi_ack_success=if(isnull(edi_ack_status), "No_Respond" , "Respond") | timechart count by edi_ack_success | eval edi_ack_request_total=No_Respond+Respond | table _time, No_Respond

```index=supply_chain_edi sourcetype="edi:x12" ``` | eval edi_ack_status_combo=edi_code+"-"+edi_code_ack+"-"+edi_ack_status | eval edi_code_groupby=if(isnull(edi_code_ack), edi_code, edi_code_ack) | stats last(_time) as _time, last(edi_requestor) as edi_requestor, last(edi_responder) as edi_responder, first(edi_code) as edi_type, values(edi_code) as edi_code, last(edi_ack_status) as edi_ack_status by edi_tr_id edi_code_groupby | search edi_ack_status=E OR edi_ack_status=R OR edi_ack_status=A | timechart count by edi_ack_status | eval total_transactions=A+E+R | eval error_retry_rate=((E+R)/total_transactions)*100 | table _time error_retry_rate

```index=supply_chain_edi sourcetype="edi:x12" ``` | eval edi_ack_status_combo=edi_code+"-"+edi_code_ack+"-"+edi_ack_status | eval edi_code_groupby=if(isnull(edi_code_ack), edi_code, edi_code_ack) | stats latest(_time) as time_last, earliest(_time) as time_first,first(_time) as _time, last(edi_requestor) as edi_requestor, last(edi_responder) as edi_responder, first(edi_code) as edi_type, list(edi_code) as edi_code, last(edi_ack_status) as edi_ack_status, count as evt_count by edi_tr_id edi_code_groupby | eval ack_time_took=time_last-time_first | timechart avg(ack_time_took) as ack_time_took

chart.title: Total stats on EDI response status (Chart)

search.query: ```index=supply_chain_edi sourcetype="edi:x12" ``` | table _time edi_ack_status edi_buyer edi_code edi_code_ack edi_cont_num edi_date edi_flag edi_requestor edi_responder edi_seller edi_sequence edi_time edi_tr_id edi_type | eval edi_ack_status_combo=edi_code+"-"+edi_code_ack+"-"+edi_ack_status | eval edi_code_groupby=if(isnull(edi_code_ack), edi_code, edi_code_ack) | stats last(_time) as _time, last(edi_requestor) as edi_requestor, last(edi_responder) as edi_responder, first(edi_code) as edi_type, values(edi_code) as edi_code, last(edi_ack_status) as edi_ack_status by edi_tr_id edi_code_groupby | search edi_code_groupby=856 NOT edi_ack_status=A | eval edi_ack_status=if(isnull(edi_ack_status), "Not Received" , edi_ack_status) | top edi_ack_status | replace E with Error, R with Reject in edi_ack_status

chart.title: Trends on EDI response status - Visual Line Chart

search.query: index=supply_chain_edi sourcetype="edi:x12" edi_code IN (850, 997) | table _time edi_ack_status edi_buyer edi_code edi_code_ack edi_cont_num edi_date edi_flag edi_requestor edi_responder edi_seller edi_sequence edi_time edi_tr_id edi_type | eval edi_ack_status_combo=edi_code+"-"+edi_code_ack+"-"+edi_ack_status | eval edi_code_groupby=if(isnull(edi_code_ack), edi_code, edi_code_ack) | stats last(_time) as _time, last(edi_requestor) as edi_requestor, last(edi_responder) as edi_responder, first(edi_code) as edi_type, values(edi_code) as edi_code, last(edi_ack_status) as edi_ack_status by edi_tr_id edi_code_groupby | eval edi_ack_success=if(isnull(edi_ack_status), "No_Respond" , "Respond") | timechart count by edi_ack_success | eval edi_ack_request_total=No_Respond+Respond

```index=supply_chain_edi sourcetype="edi:x12" ``` | eval edi_ack_status_combo=edi_code+"-"+edi_code_ack+"-"+edi_ack_status | eval edi_code_groupby=if(isnull(edi_code_ack), edi_code, edi_code_ack) | stats last(_time) as _time, last(edi_requestor) as edi_requestor, last(edi_responder) as edi_responder, first(edi_code) as edi_type, values(edi_code) as edi_code, last(edi_ack_status) as edi_ack_status by edi_tr_id edi_code_groupby | search edi_ack_status=E OR edi_ack_status=R OR edi_ack_status=A | timechart count by edi_ack_status | eval total_transactions=A+E+R | eval error_retry_rate=((E+R)/total_transactions)*100

index=supply_chain_edi sourcetype="edi:x12" NOT edi_code=997 [ search index=supply_chain_edi sourcetype="edi:x12" source=edi_quantumline_customer_full NOT edi_code=997 | eval edi_ack_status_combo=edi_code+"-"+edi_code_ack+"-"+edi_ack_status | eval edi_code_groupby=if(isnull(edi_code_ack), edi_code, edi_code_ack) | strcat edi_code "-" edi_ack_status edi_event_pattern_combo | stats count as evt_cnt by edi_tr_id edi_code | search evt_cnt>2 | table edi_tr_id ] | table _time edi_tr_id edi_requestor edi_responder edi_code edi_type edi_cont_num edi_date edi_flag edi_time | sort edi_tr_id, _time | top edi_responder

chart.title: Trends on EDI transmission success rates w/ occurrences

search.query: ```index=supply_chain_edi sourcetype="edi:x12" ``` | table _time edi_ack_status edi_buyer edi_code edi_code_ack edi_cont_num edi_date edi_flag edi_requestor edi_responder edi_seller edi_sequence edi_time edi_tr_id edi_type | eval edi_ack_status_combo=edi_code+"-"+edi_code_ack+"-"+edi_ack_status | eval edi_code_groupby=if(isnull(edi_code_ack), edi_code, edi_code_ack) | stats last(_time) as _time, last(edi_requestor) as edi_requestor, last(edi_responder) as edi_responder, first(edi_code) as edi_type, values(edi_code) as edi_code, last(edi_ack_status) as edi_ack_status by edi_tr_id edi_code_groupby | eval edi_ack_success=if(isnull(edi_ack_status), "No_Respond" , "Respond") | timechart count by edi_ack_success | eval edi_ack_request_total=No_Respond+Respond | eval edi_ack_success_rate=(Respond/edi_ack_request_total)*100 | fields - edi_ack_request_total

chart.title: Trends when response rates were below SLA.

search.query: | eval edi_ack_status_combo=edi_code+"-"+edi_code_ack+"-"+edi_ack_status | eval edi_code_groupby=if(isnull(edi_code_ack), edi_code, edi_code_ack) | stats last(_time) as _time, last(edi_requestor) as edi_requestor, last(edi_responder) as edi_responder, first(edi_code) as edi_type, values(edi_code) as edi_code, last(edi_ack_status) as edi_ack_status by edi_tr_id edi_code_groupby | eval edi_ack_success=if(isnull(edi_ack_status), "No_Respond" , "Respond") | timechart count by edi_ack_success | eval edi_ack_request_total=No_Respond+Respond | eval edi_ack_success_rate=(Respond/edi_ack_request_total)*100 | search edi_ack_success_rate<80 | table _time, edi_ack_success_rate

chart.title: RESULT ANALYSIS 01 : EDI Transactions with response status determined.

search.query: ```index=supply_chain_edi sourcetype="edi:x12" ``` | eval edi_ack_status_combo=edi_code+"-"+edi_code_ack+"-"+edi_ack_status | eval edi_code_groupby=if(isnull(edi_code_ack), edi_code, edi_code_ack) | stats latest(_time) as time_last, earliest(_time) as time_first,first(_time) as _time, last(edi_requestor) as edi_requestor, last(edi_responder) as edi_responder, first(edi_code) as edi_type, list(edi_code) as edi_code, last(edi_ack_status) as edi_ack_status, count as evt_count by edi_tr_id edi_code_groupby | eval ack_time_took=time_last-time_first | timechart avg(ack_time_took) as ack_time_took

chart.title: RESULT ANALYSIS 02 : Total stats on EDI response status

search.query: ```index=supply_chain_edi sourcetype="edi:x12" ``` | eval edi_ack_status_combo=edi_code+"-"+edi_code_ack+"-"+edi_ack_status | eval edi_code_groupby=if(isnull(edi_code_ack), edi_code, edi_code_ack) | stats latest(_time) as time_last, earliest(_time) as time_first,first(_time) as _time, last(edi_requestor) as edi_requestor, last(edi_responder) as edi_responder, first(edi_code) as edi_type, values(edi_code) as edi_code, last(edi_ack_status) as edi_ack_status by edi_tr_id edi_code_groupby | eval ack_time_took=time_last-time_first | search edi_ack_status=A ack_time_took>1000 | timechart count

```index=supply_chain_edi sourcetype="edi:x12" ``` | table _time edi_ack_status edi_buyer edi_code edi_code_ack edi_cont_num edi_date edi_flag edi_requestor edi_responder edi_seller edi_sequence edi_time edi_tr_id edi_type edi_name | eval edi_ack_status_combo=edi_code+"-"+edi_code_ack+"-"+edi_ack_status | eval edi_code_groupby=if(isnull(edi_code_ack), edi_code, edi_code_ack) | stats last(_time) as _time, last(edi_requestor) as edi_requestor, last(edi_responder) as edi_responder, values(edi_code) as edi_type, values(edi_code) as edi_code, last(edi_name) as edi_name, last(edi_ack_status) as edi_ack_status by edi_tr_id edi_code_groupby | search edi_code_groupby=856 NOT edi_ack_status=A | table _time edi_tr_id edi_requestor edi_responder edi_code edi_name edi_ack_status | eval edi_ack_status=if(isnull(edi_ack_status), "Not Received" , edi_ack_status)

table.title: RESULT ANALYSIS 02 : Total stats on EDI response status

search.query: ```index=supply_chain_edi sourcetype="edi:x12" ``` | eval edi_ack_status_combo=edi_code+"-"+edi_code_ack+"-"+edi_ack_status | eval edi_code_groupby=if(isnull(edi_code_ack), edi_code, edi_code_ack) | stats latest(_time) as time_last, earliest(_time) as time_first,first(_time) as _time, last(edi_requestor) as edi_requestor, last(edi_responder) as edi_responder, first(edi_code) as edi_type, values(edi_code) as edi_code, last(edi_ack_status) as edi_ack_status by edi_tr_id edi_code_groupby | eval ack_time_took=time_last-time_first | search edi_ack_status=A ack_time_took>1000 | table _time edi_tr_id time_last time_first edi_requestor edi_responder edi_code edi_ack_status ack_time_took
